name: | ARCADE |
description:
| ARCADE |

Breathe.

Contemplate the infinite. Wander in the eternal.

Seize perception, Rouse your senses.

This is | ARCADE |

Info

This experience was created in three days as part of the Video Games Lab Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Arcade". I got inspired by the architectural arcade and tried to create a procedural infinite world. This is the result.
Turn the volume up, empty your mind, enjoy!

Thank you for playing : )

Assets

External assets used:

- Deer & Tiger by jokelydesigns, available here: https://free3d.com/user/jokelydesigns

- Cat, Wolf, Cow & Goat by snippysnappets, available here: https://free3d.com/user/snippysnappets
